Paragraph: In conclusion , a highly effective photovoltaic polymer with NIR response , PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) , based on alternating 3,6-dithien-2-yl-2 , 5-dibutylpyrrolo[3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione units has been synthesized.

Let's think step by step.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In conclusion , a highly effective photovoltaic polymer with NIR response , PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) , based on alternating 3,6-dithien-2-yl-2 , 5-dibutylpyrrolo[3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione units has been synthesized.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| highly effective photovoltaic polymer |
| with NIR response |
| PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) |
| based on |
| alternating 3,6-dithien-2-yl-2, 5-dibutylpyrrolo[3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione units |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| highly effective photovoltaic polymer with NIR response |
| PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) |
| alternating 3,6-dithien-2-yl-2, 5-dibutylpyrrolo[3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione units |

Explanation:

* "In conclusion" and "has been synthesized" do not refer to material properties.
* "with NIR response" describes a property of the photovoltaic polymer.
* "based on" indicates the composition of the material.
* "PDTP - DTDPP(Bu)" is the name of the synthesized material.
* "alternating 3,6-dithien-2-yl-2, 5-dibutylpyrrolo[3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione units" describes the structure of the material.

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In conclusion , a highly effective photovoltaic polymer with NIR response , PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) , based on alternating 3,6-dithien-2-yl-2 , 5-dibutylpyrrolo[3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione units has been synthesized.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value            |
|--------------------------|
| highly effective photovoltaic polymer |
| NIR response             |
| PDTP - DTDPP(Bu)         |
| based on alternating 3,6-dithien-2-yl-2, 5-dibutylpyrrolo[3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione units |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value            |
|--------------------------|
| highly effective photovoltaic polymer with NIR response |
| PDTP - DTDPP(Bu)         |
| 3,6-dithien-2-yl-2, 5-dibutylpyrrolo[3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione units |

Explanation:

* "In conclusion" and "has been synthesized" are not property values.
* "a highly effective photovoltaic polymer with NIR response" refers to the material property of the synthesized polymer, which is both a type of material (polymer) and a property (highly effective, NIR response). I have kept it as one entity.
* "PDTP - DTDPP(Bu)" is the name of the specific photovoltaic polymer.
* "based on" indicates the method or process used to synthesize the polymer.
* "alternating 3,6-dithien-2-yl-2, 5-dibutylpyrrolo[3,4-c]pyrrole-1,4-dione units" refers to the chemical structure of the units used in the synthesis of the polymer. I have kept it as one entity.
